direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods construct URLs but with different types of parameters (Map vs. ArrayList).
buildFullUrl directly depends on joinQueryParameters to process and append query parameters.
Both joinQueryParameters and joinStreamUrls handle joining parameters into a string with similar control flows.
urlEncode is used within joinQueryParameters, which is a dependency for buildFullUrl.
Both methods generate a string representation of data, though for different purposes (URL construction vs. timestamp).
